name: Green Parkland Estate Walk, Melford Hall

ai.summary: A gentle 3.6 km loop around Green Parkland Estate by Melford Hall. The easy route combines flat, well-maintained tracks with scenic parkland, making it suitable for families and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly level paths with a mix of gravel, grass, and occasional compacted soil. The route is easy underfoot, with a few short gentle rises and potential mud after wet weather.
ai.safety_notes: Please check access and opening times for Green Parkland Estate and Melford Hall before you go, as policies can change. Wear sturdy footwear and be prepared for UK weather, which can change quickly. Stay on marked trails to protect wildlife and property, and respect any signs or closures. Keep children and pets in sight; leash dogs where required. Be mindful of other visitors, cyclists, and horse riders on shared paths. Mobile signal can be patchy in rural areas—carry a map or download offline, and have a plan for emergencies. If you’re unsure about the route, turn back or seek local guidance.
recommended_gear: Map, guidebook, or offline map on your phone
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly late March to October) when days are longer and weather is milder; the walk is also feasible in winter, but conditions may be less pleasant.

seo.title: Green Parkland Estate Walk, Melford Hall – 3.6 km Easy Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a gentle 3.6 km walk through Green Parkland Estate by Melford Hall. Easy terrain, scenic parkland, practical safety tips, and gear suggestions for this UK hike.
